publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2006# Dennis Canavan: St Andrew’s Day—That the Parliament believes that St Andrew’s Day should be recognised as Scotland’s National Day with a nationwide celebration of Scotland’s diversity of cultures, faiths and ethnic origins. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Michael McMahon*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Fergus Ewing*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-2006# St Andrew’s Day (lodged on 15 November 2004) Mark Ballard*, Rob Gibson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Brian Adam*, Margo MacDonald*, John Swinburne*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Michael Matheson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2006# St Andrew’s Day (lodged on 15 November 2004) Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2006# St Andrew’s Day (lodged on 15 November 2004) Marlyn Glen*, Campbell Martin*

S2M-2006# Dennis Canavan: St Andrew's Day—That the Parliament believes that St Andrew’s Day should be recognised as Scotland’s National Day with a nationwide celebration of Scotland’s diversity of cultures, faiths and ethnic origins. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Mark Ruskell, Michael McMahon, Mr Bruce McFee, Fergus Ewing, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper, Chris Ballance, Mark Ballard, Rob Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Margo MacDonald, John Swinburne, Bruce Crawford, Mr Andrew Welsh, Michael Matheson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Marlyn Glen, Campbell Martin, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Tricia Marwick*, Eleanor Scott*, Jim Mather*, Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-2006# St Andrew’s Day (lodged on 15 November 2004) Mike Pringle*
S2M-2006# St Andrew’s Day (lodged on 15 November 2004) Bill Butler*
S2M-2006# St Andrew’s Day (lodged on 15 November 2004) Iain Smith*, Cathie Craigie*

S2M-2006# Dennis Canavan: St Andrew’s Day—That the Parliament believes that St Andrew’s Day should be recognised as Scotland’s National Day with a nationwide celebration of Scotland’s diversity of cultures, faiths and ethnic origins. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Mark Ruskell, Michael McMahon, Mr Bruce McFee, Fergus Ewing, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper, Chris Ballance, Mark Ballard, Rob Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Margo MacDonald, John Swinburne, Bruce Crawford, Mr Andrew Welsh, Michael Matheson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Marlyn Glen, Campbell Martin, Stewart Stevenson, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Tricia Marwick, Eleanor Scott, Jim Mather, Christine Grahame, Rosie Kane, Dr Jean Turner, Mike Pringle, Bill Butler, Iain Smith, Cathie Craigie
S2M-2006# St Andrew’s Day (lodged on 15 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*
